title: Bizarre Watch Face
summary: Bizarre analogue watch face. Current hour is rendered larger.
description: Android Wear watch face with bizarre analogue clock dial. Current hour is rendered larger.Features• Select from 3 different themes:  Silver, Gold and Bizarre!• Tiny calendar showing date• Vintage battery indicator• Seconds hand with moving ticks• Configuration options.Accessing Watch face settings• Option 1, using the phone: Open the Android Wear app, and then tap the white gear icon in the center of the selected watch face.• Option 2, directly on watch: Tap and hold anywhere on the watch face, and then select the white gear icon.Requirements: Android Wear 5.0 or higher. Both square and round screen devices are supported.Disclaimer: The application is provided as is without liabilities or warranties of any kind, either express or implied.
descriptionHTML:
Android Wear watch face with bizarre analogue clock dial. Current hour is rendered larger.

Features
• Select from 3 different themes:
Silver, Gold and Bizarre!
• Tiny calendar showing date
• Vintage battery indicator
• Seconds hand with moving ticks
• Configuration options.

Accessing Watch face settings
• Option 1, using the phone: Open the Android Wear app, and then tap the white gear icon in the center of the selected watch face.
• Option 2, directly on watch: Tap and hold anywhere on the watch face, and then select the white gear icon.

Requirements: Android Wear 5.0 or higher. Both square and round screen devices are supported.
Disclaimer: The application is provided as is without liabilities or warranties of any kind, either express or implied.
comments: I do like this watch but there are 2 functions I'd love added to it if you can. 1. Extend the time to something like 20 seconds before it goes into ambient mode. 2. To have the ability to press on the date and it show your agenda for the day. If you could do that for me that last star would be lit up like a Christmas tree :))
For those requesting longer time, simply buy StayLit Wear.......
Feb22 2017 has nice look but no complications support..
Great watch face but the 6 is cut off on the moto 360 2nd gen
Looking good Another great watch face. Thanks.
